newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB-120 index rises 2.3 points to 804.9 pts.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB-120 index rises 2.3 points to 804.9 pts.

text.p: The CNB-120 index, a broad daily measure of Czech equities, rose 2.3 points on Thursday to 804.9, the Czech National Bank (CNB) said.
Five of the ten sectoral indices gained, with the energy index rising the most, up 14.3 points, or 1.53 percent, to 945.9 points.
Five indices lost, with the trade index losing the most, down 8.0 points, 3.24 percent, to 238.9.
